column2: even if it causes them extreme pain and suffering. Do you agree? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."

column2: such as horses and dolphins

column1: > "It is right to use medicine tested on animals
column2: like pigs and monkeys

column2: such as fur and leather

column5: but their labor is not monetarily compensated – even though they put in effort and time. Is this okay? Please answer 'yes' or 'no'."
